mapper.sql: fy_trans_data d left join merch_info as m on d.merchantno_fuiou = m.merchno left join sys_dept as dept on m.dept_id = dept.dept_id
mapper.select:
select d.id as id , d.out_trade_no as trace_no , d.total_fee as amt, d.merchantno_fuiou as merchant_id, dept.name, d.share_benefit, d.createtime as txn_datetime, d.terminal_trace as txn_ref, d.terminal_id , right(d.cardno,4) as shortPan, d.pay_status as respCode, d.pay_type as issuerCode , d.card_type as cardType
from
WHERE
order by t.id asc
limit #{offset}, #{limit}
